text: Unless the articles of organization otherwise provide, member approval under § 29-1014.02 shall not be required for a limited cooperative association to:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 1501 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-1014.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Sell, lease, exchange, license, or otherwise dispose of all or any part of the assets of the association in the usual and regular course of business; or
Mortgage, pledge, dedicate to the repayment of indebtedness, or encumber in any way all or any part of the assets of the association whether or not in the usual and regular course of business.

heading.catch_text: Disposition of assets not requiring member approval.
